title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials       Soldier's Day Lesson Plans» Fort Stanwix National Monument offers Fourth (4th) Grade Educational programs! PDF download  Holiday Treasures Lesson Plans>> PDF download  Teaching with Historic Places Lesson Plans » Take advantage of teaching with historic places lessons plans based on the Oriskany Battlefield State Historic Site and Fort Stanwix National Monument.
